Jadeja to Finch, no run stronger appeal this time but not given. They're not going to review. This looked very close, but perhaps he was struck just outside the line of off. Good flight by Jadeja, and on a nice length, he's coming forward to defend but is beaten on the inside edge and struck on t

Chahal to Finch, no run turn again, but Finch gets forward to defend this outside off

Jadeja to Finch, no run given some air outside off, and he defends

Chahal to Finch, no run googly outside off, he can't work it away

Chahal to Finch, SIX runs nails the slog across the line. The length was too full that time from Chahal, and Finch spotted that, took a confident stride out and whacked it across the line and over the deep midwicket fence
Chahal to Finch, no run flatter, length ball on the stumps, some turn still, defended from the crease

Jadeja to Finch, no run flatter outside off, jabbed back to the bowler's right
Jadeja to Finch, no run some more flight on that, still outside off, driven to cover
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run this time he tosses it up wider outside off and Finch flays that through cover to raise fifty. Not always fluent but he's done his part in giving Australia a great platform
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run flatter on leg stump, tucked to backward square leg's right
Jadeja to Finch, no run targetting the stumps and Finch offers a straight bat back

Bumrah to Finch, 1 run misses the direct hit at the bowler's end. Length ball angling into him, and this was tapped to mid-on. They ran through and Jadeja was the man there, swoops in and lets loose a throw. Misses the stumps - Finch was miles out if he had hit
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run slower ball, strays on the pads, tucked through square

Bumrah to Finch, no run back of a length, keeping it tight coming into him on off, goes on the back foot and flat-bats it to midiwcket
Bumrah to Finch, 1 run not as short that time, so doesn't bounce as much and allows Finch to stay on the back foot and swivel-pull this to deep square leg
Bumrah to Warner, no run almost a yorker, digs it out into the legside
Jadeja to Finch, no run down the track, but Jadeja had shortened his length and the ball hits the bat high. Pops up in the air but drops near his feet
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run goes forward and whips this across his pads through square
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length ball on the stumps, Warner goes back and keeps bat close to body while tapping it through square leg
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run length ball on the stumps, patted to long-on. Jadeja wanted to go across and field but ran into Warner at the non-striker's end. No damage done
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length on the stumps and Warner continues to play him in the same fashion, minimal backlift and follow through while slapping it through square, on the back foot
Jadeja to Finch, no run patted back down the pitch to the bowler
Bumrah to Warner, FOUR runs slammed through midwicket. Too short and a bit slower, enough time for Warner to sit back and pull this with authority
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run fuller on the stumps, angling into him, flicked backward of square
Bumrah to Finch, no run yorker on the stumps, goes back and punches to mid-on
Bumrah to Finch, 1 run yorker outside off, uses wrists to dig this out to midwicket. A bit of a fumble as two fielders converge so they take a quick single
Bumrah to Warner, (no ball) and Bumrah lets Warner know that he's not here just to make up numbers. Excellent bouncer, outside off, Warner sways out of the way

Bumrah to Warner, 4 leg byes unlucky for the bowler. Warner was backing away a long way, Bumrah followed him and did so excellently too, but the yorker length ball flicks his pad and goes very fine for four leg-byes
Bumrah to Warner, no run short ball again, rising up to Warner's ribs, and he can't time the pull. Drops down near him off the bottom edge
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run fuller, tapped to long-on
Jadeja to Warner, no run keeps it on a fuller length on the stumps, Warner goes back and across and taps it back to the bowler's left

Jadeja to Warner, 2 runs excellent running again and Warner has raised fifty. He's been almost quietly dominant. I know that's an oxymoron, bur Warner's pulled it off. Plays what has been his favourite shot off Jadeja to get there, the minimal flourish flat pull through square leg
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run fuller, driven to long-on
Jadeja to Finch, FOUR runs plonked to the long-on boundary. Sees the length is fuller and the ball is wider and goes on the front foot to loft this over mid-on. One bounce into the fence
Jadeja to Finch, no run slows it up a bit, on a length outside off, turned to midwicket
Chahal to Warner, no run flatter and fullish, defended on the front foot

Chahal to Warner, no run flatter on the stumps, tapped to midwicket again. Kohli's had a busy time this over
Chahal to Warner, 1 run tossed up on the pads, this time he turns it more square to keep it clear of Kohli and gets a single
Jadeja to Warner, FOUR runs reverse swept for four to fine leg. Fuller and some drift across the stumps, Warner saw the length and went down early to reverse sweep. Timed and placed perfectly
Jadeja to Warner, 2 runs length ball, punched off the back foot through cover

Jadeja to Warner, no run driven off the back foot to the bowler's left. Jadeja fields

Shami to Warner, no run length ball on the stumps to tuck him up, tapped towards square leg
Shami to Warner, 1 run fuller, angling across him, punched from outside off to extra cover. Bit of a fumble but an easy single was there to be had anyway
Shami to Finch, 1 run length on off, he's making some room, gets bat down in time to steer this to short third man
Shami to Warner, no run length ball, steered to short third man
Shami to Warner, no run fuller on the stumps, he goes back and digs out a drive to mid-off
Shami to Warner, 2 runs length outside off, chopped to third man
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run stays back and cuts to point
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
Jadeja to Finch, no run down the track, gets a leading edge trying to work it away, but it falls well short of point
Jadeja to Finch, SIX runs boom. This time his foray down the track is successful. The length is fuller too and he absolutely smashes his loft over long-on
Jadeja to Finch, 2 runs down the track again, not quite the right timing this time, but he hits with power towards long-on
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run another few steps down, opens the face to steer to point's right.
Shami to Finch, no run fuller, tailing into the stumps, clipped to mid-on
Shami to Finch, 1 run nips back in from a length to hit him on the pads, as he's trying to swat this across, goes off the pad to point. Half an appeal from Shami

Shami to Warner, FOUR runs slammed. That is just disdainful. Shami goes fuller and Warner stays still and just swats it over midwicket's head and into the boundary. Didn't even have a big flourish but timed it so well, he didn't need to
Shami to Warner, 2 runs length ball tucks him up on the stumps, steered to cover. The fielder lets loose a throw and misses, no one backing up so they get a second

Shami to Warner, OUT huge appeal for a catch by the keeper and not given. Kohli has gone for the review. Yorker length ball, shaping away a touch, his bat hit ground as the ball went past and Rahul had an easy take. And there is a spike as the ball goes past the outside edge with the bat not yet
Shami to Smith, no run Full on the stumps, picked up off his toes to mid-on
Chahal to Finch, no run fuller, driven with authority but can't beat Kohli at cover
Chahal to Finch, no run fuller outside off, pushed to cover
Chahal to Finch, 1 run skips down the track and takes it on the half volley to whip this from his pads to deep square leg
Chahal to Smith, no run tossed up, Smith was looking to work it away to leg but gets a leading edge. bounces back to Chahal
Chahal to Smith, no run flatter on off, waits on it and punches to point
Chahal to Smith, (no ball) 1 run fuller and wider outside off, uses his hands and wrists to whip this through cover

Chahal to Finch, FOUR runs doesn't time it, but places it well - switch hit, or a reverse slog at any rate, I'm not sure he changed grip. Went way across and picked out the left-hander's square leg boundary
Saini to Smith, 1 run back of a length, on a sixth stump line, steered to third man

Chahal to Finch, no run a bit flatter, drift into him on off, defended towards mid-on
Saini to Smith, no run full but straying on the pads, nudged but there's a short midwicket there who fields

Saini to Finch, FOUR runs super shot rides the bounce of this back of a length ball outside off and carves it over point. Superbly done.
Jadeja to Smith, no run tossed up, it just grips, Smith mistimes back to Jadeja

Jadeja to Smith, no run Given LBW! Smith reviews. Jadeja pushed through another quicker flatter ball, it was shorter, Smith went right back trying to work to leg and got hit high on the pad. He thought it was too high. The umpire was convinced it was hitting. No bat involved. Ball tracking says i
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs advances down the track and flicks high and just wide of Bumrah at deep square! Wasn't far away from the fielder

Saini to Finch, 2 runs short and wide, he cuts nicely past backward point, wide of third man for two
Saini to Finch, no run full outside off, Finch sets himself and crunches this straight to cover
Saini to Finch, no run 138kph, back of a length on off, he is back and pushing this to cover-point

Shami to Smith, no run full on leg stump, Smith pings this off his pads and Kohli makes a superb diving save with the right hand only. That was timed superbly
Shami to Smith, 1 wide slower ball bouncer, Smith sways under it, it's called wide for height. Tough call. Looked tight
Shami to Smith, 1 run slower ball bouncer, 123kph, wider of off, he reaches up and pulls forward of square

Shami to Smith, 1 run yorker length, he is squared up again squeezing this into the off side
Jadeja to Smith, no run 93kph, darted into leg, he drives to straight midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, no run short and wide, he misses a cut and falls over but keeps his back toe down as Rahul whips the bails off
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs lofted inside out over cover! Offered some width, he leaned but to get the elevation, didn't nail it but hit it well enough over the man
Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs cut past backward point! He timed this one superbly. Short and fractionally wide, he created room and nailed it behind point
Jadeja to Smith, no run 95kph, flatter on middle, he pushes towards long on but Jadeja cuts it off

Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs Shikhar misses it at long on! It was sky ball, a complete mis hit high to long on trying to go into the stands, Shikhar ran in initially and then it carried over his head and landed inside the rope and rolled over for four! Horror misjudgement
Shami to Finch, 1 run full on off, he pushes a drive to long on
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs flicked with the bottom hand over midwicket! Full and tailing in, he just used the bottom hand to flick this flat over the man on the circle at midwicket
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs 138kph angled down leg, he tucks this behind square and it races away to the rope! 50 off 36 balls for Smith!
Shami to Smith, 1 run 138kph, good length, top of middle, he's back and across and tucking this to midwicket
Shami to Finch, 1 run 136kph, he drives a full ball to long on, they push for two but it's not on. The sweeper raced in and did well
Shami to Smith, 1 run 116kph, slower ball, back of a length, fourth stump, he leans back and runs this to third man
Chahal to Smith, no run 88kph, drifting in and sliding on, he gives room and cuts to backward point
Chahal to Smith, FOUR runs short wide leg break, it sat up and said 'hit me' and Smith whacked past point for four!
Chahal to Smith, 1 run he dances down and whips a full ball to deep square
Chahal to Finch, 2 runs he dances down and whips this wide of midwicket for two! A century for Finch on return to Australia. His 17th in ODI cricket. Again he raised his bat to the heavens.
Chahal to Finch, 1 run flatter and quicker on leg, he's back and tucking this behind square
Chahal to Smith, SIX runs lofted inside out over wide long off! What a shot! Tossed up outside off, he moved down and stayed legside to lift it high over the rope

Bumrah to Finch, 2 runs dropped by Chahal at short fine! Tough chance. It was angled down leg, he flicked it fine, Chahal at full stretch to his left got a hand but it didn't stick. Kohli applauded the runs saved

Bumrah to Finch, FOUR runs Mayank misfields at deep square! He glanced this off the toes behind square, Mayank ran to the ball and just ran past is! Might have got his spikes caught. This is disastrous for India
Bumrah to Finch, FOUR runs another ball down leg, and another ball glanced past short fine for four more!
Bumrah to Finch, no run 121kph, short slower ball, he leaned back to try to run to third man but gets a bottom edge that bounces to Rahul
Bumrah to Finch, 2 runs 138kph, yorker down leg, he glances it fine, Finch runs well for two

Bumrah to Finch, OUT An attempted ramp goes wrong! He lobs a catch to Rahul. It was a bouncer that just sat up above his head, he tried to ramp it over Rahul but he just lobbed it up off the face of the bat to Rahul
Chahal to Smith, no run 84kph, he drives to cover
Chahal to Smith, SIX runs slog sweep over the midwicket rope! It was in the arc, he got down on one knee and hammered it
Chahal to Smith, 1 run tossed up, he drives neatly to long on
Chahal to Stoinis, OUT caught behind! A top-spinner outside off, Stoinis goes back and tried to punch off the back foot, gets an edge and Rahul takes an excellent catch
Chahal to Maxwell, no run short wide leg break, he cracks a cut straight to backward point
Chahal to Maxwell, 1 run lovely leg break, drift and turn, he drives watchfully through cover-point
Bumrah to Maxwell, FOUR runs 132kph, half volley, he drives fluently, just an easy push and it races past cover! Great shot from Maxwell
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run 140kph, back of a length, he is back and forcing this to deep cover-point
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run 139kph, back of a length on off, he gets back and across and tucks it behind square
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run 120kph, slower ball bouncer, he waits and pulls with control behind square
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run 144kph full angled down leg, he glances this to deep fine leg
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 wide 119kph, slower ball bouncer but it bounces very high and is called wide
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run 139kph, full and angled into middle, he drives with the angle to midwicket but can't beat the man
Chahal to Smith, 1 run drifting into leg stump, he sits back and tucks it behind square
Chahal to Maxwell, FOUR runs switch hit up and over backward point! Tossed up outside off, he switched his feet early, set himself and reverse swept it up and over backward point!
Chahal to Maxwell, SIX runs switch hit reverse for six this time! Same shot, same delivery, but he flushed this flat and hard over backward point. Sublime skill
Chahal to Maxwell, 2 runs shorter length, he's back and working this neatly through midwicket into the gap for two
Chahal to Maxwell, 2 runs drifting way down leg, he sweeps and gets a little tickle fine and it runs away for two more

Chahal to Maxwell, SIX runs Tipped over the rope by Hardik Pandya at wide long off! Tossed up outside off, Maxwell launched this hard and flat to wide long off, Hardik was in off the rope, he had to back pedal a touch, he jumped up with one hand but just tipped it up and over for six
Saini to Smith, 1 run 141kph, full on leg stump, he clips this neatly to deep midwicket

Saini to Maxwell, SIX runs launched into the Ladies Stand! Full and straight but not a yorker, he cleared the front leg, sitting deep, he scooped it with the bottom hand and hit it way back over midwicket!
Saini to Maxwell, no run 121kph, slower ball off cutter wide of off, he leaves this thinking it was a wide but it was well within reach
Saini to Maxwell, no run an appeal for caught behind but he played and missed and hit the ground. Full and wide of off, he tried to drive but missed trying to slice it square

Saini to Maxwell, FOUR runs Shreyas can't complete the chance diving at deep point but it gets past him for four! Shreyas was unlucky. Maxwell sliced it to deep point, it was tailing an dipping as Shreyas dived forward and he couldn't get a hand on it and it gets past for four
Saini to Maxwell, FOUR runs full and wide, he slices this up and over point again! Well away from the fielder this time
Shami to Smith, SIX runs launched over square leg! Rank delivery. Short on off, it just sat up, he was back and waiting to hammer a pull flat into the crowd
Shami to Smith, 1 run 131kph, full on middle, he tucks this off his toes to midwicket
Shami to Maxwell, no run short ball outside off, Maxwell nearly swings himself off his feet but he misses
Shami to Maxwell, FOUR runs reverse lap sweep! Insane skill! No third man back. It was full outside off, he set up to reverse lap and pulled it off perfectly!

Shami to Maxwell, OUT caught at long on! Straight down Jadeja's throat and he doesn't let it go! Full outside off, he swatted this hard and flat but didn't get the elevation, Jadeja was in off the rope but he didn't have to move
Shami to Labuschagne, 2 runs 138kph, full on off, he lofts a drive straight of long off, Smith calls two immediately and gets back to the non-striker's easily
Saini to Smith, 1 run 139kph, thigh high full toss surprises Smith, he bunts this to cover and they pinch one

Saini to Labuschagne, OUT holed out to long off! Slower ball does the trick, 116kph, Labuschagne lofted it high but into the wind to long off, Dhawan comes around and takes it easily 10m in from the rope
Saini to Smith, 1 wide 139kph, full down leg, he misses out on a boundary as he can't make contact but it will be re-bowled
Saini to Smith, 2 runs 138kph, full outside off, there's those hands, Smith steers this beautifully behind point, opening the face late to get two
Saini to Smith, 1 run sets up for the paddle scoop, but it's the wrong length and line, he stands up and bunts it into the off side
Saini to Carey, 1 run 119kph, wide slower ball, he square drives and the man at backward point makes a good save to prevent more than one
Saini to Smith, no run 118kph, slower ball off cutter, wide of off, Smith misses out on this one trying to guide it to third man
Bumrah to Carey, 1 run 135kph, yorker, speared at the toes, he jams the bat down, gets an inside edge to fine leg
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run 118kph, wide slower ball, he reaches out and square drives to deep point
Bumrah to Carey, 1 run 140kph, cracking yorker, not much Carey could do other than dig it out into the off side
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive dragging it to long on
Bumrah to Carey, no run 140kph, yorker speared into leg stump, Carey gives room but gouges it out to the bowler
Bumrah to Carey, 2 runs 138kph, another yorker, Carey pushes this slowly to long on and calls two straight away and they run well
Saini to Smith, SIX runs launched over cover! Magnificent shot. A half volley wide of off, he leaned back and threw the hands through the line. Superb strike over the rope at cover
Saini to Smith, 1 run 137kph, yorker, Smith faked to give room and stepped outside off late trying to paddle fine but got it off the toe of the bat to short fine

Cummins to Hardik, 1 run length outside off, punched to mid-off's left
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on leg stump, cramping him for room. Dhawan tries to run it down to third man but doesn't make great connection and it trickles close to him
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs finds the gap. Too full and on the pads, and Dhawan goes for timing and placement over power, flicks it square. The fine leg is rather fine so he finds the fence
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on leg stump, nipping across him, opens him up a bit but he steers to short third man
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball on leg stump, tries to flick it but gets a leading edge that plops into the offside
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller and on off, gives him the room to open the bat face and steer to third man
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run flat on off, good bowling, tight and no room to the batsman who can only nudge it towards point
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run drags it down short but Pandya can't capitalise, went too hard at it. Didn't time it, rolls to deep midwicket
Zampa to Jadeja, no run googly first up, comes forward and steers it to short third man
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run tossed up fuller, flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run flatter and shorter, he moves across and works it to midwicket
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run short ball to start with, Pandya keeps his pull down, to midwicket
Cummins to Jadeja, no run back of a length cuts it to point
Cummins to Jadeja, no run short ball, rising up to his ribs, he goes on his toes and flat bats it down to midwicket
Cummins to Jadeja, no run back of a length, keeping it on a tight line and denying him any room. Jadeja can only hop and tap it towards midwicket
Cummins to Jadeja, no run length outside off, flashes at it, but can't beat point
Cummins to Jadeja, no run length ball, stump to stump, jabbed towards cover. No single. Only one run in the over, fantastic from Cummins
Zampa to Hardik, no run gives it some air and it spins away from off, he wants to smash that but can't connect with the cut
Zampa to Hardik, no run fuller, and he digs it out back to the bowler
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run flatter outside off, some room, thrashes it through cover, but not timed well
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run googly, he was moving away to give himself room, ends up punching through cover from close to his body
Zampa to Hardik, 1 wide backing away to leg and Zampa does well to keep it inside the tramline outside off. Hardik can't reach that and doesn't even try
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run googly, quicker on a length on off, chopped through cover
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run fuller, driven to mid-off
Cummins to Jadeja, 1 run short ball, Jadeja takes him on with a pull, is a bit late on it and it goes finer than intended. Fine leg cleans up
Cummins to Hardik, FOUR runs he's beaten mid-on. Shorter length, he slaps a pull shot very straight. Mid-on had to dive to his left but couldn't stop it
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run moves across and unleashes a fierce pull to a back of a length one, but that didn't bounce as much as he expected, so he couldn't nail the shot properly
Cummins to Jadeja, no run fuller on the stumps, taps it towards gully and wants the single, but Hardik is not interested
Cummins to Jadeja, 2 runs full on the pads, flicked through midwicket
Cummins to Jadeja, 1 run keeps it full on the stumps, Jadeja pats it softly towards mid-off and takes off for a quick single. Makes it
Zampa to Jadeja, no run tossed up on leg stump, went to sweep but was beaten in flight and struck on the pads
Zampa to Jadeja, no run comes on the front foot to try and steer this one from outside off away for a single. Can't get it away
Zampa to Jadeja, no run beaten again, stays in his crease that time, nice flight by Zampa, dips and turns into him, hits the pad. Half appeal
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run slightly wider that time, pitches on off and Jadeja manages to punch it away to point

Zampa to Hardik, OUT caught at long-on. He had to go for it, with the dot balls piling up and the run-rate climbing. This wasn't tossed up, it was flatter in fact, which meant Hardik couldn't get underneath it properly. Still went for it, and lofted it almost cleanly, but not enough to carry over
Zampa to Saini, no run tossed up outside off, driven to cover
Hazlewood to Jadeja, 1 run length outside off, steered to third man
Hazlewood to Saini, no run back of a length outside off, Saini has a waft at it, doesn't connect
Hazlewood to Saini, no run length ball on a fourth stump line, beats him on the attempted punch
Hazlewood to Saini, no run bowls this on off stump after keeping the first two outside, but Saini jabs his bat down in time to keep it out
Hazlewood to Saini, 1 run short ball down leg, and he gets some bat on it, pulling it down to fine leg
Hazlewood to Jadeja, 1 run length on the stumps, flicked to deep square leg
Maxwell to Jadeja, no run tossed up on leg, he tries to flick it and misses
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run tossed up on off, cut away to cover
Maxwell to Saini, no run flatter on off, tapped to midwicket
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run length ball on the stumps, worked through midwicket
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run flatter outside off, nudged to wide long-on
Maxwell to Saini, no run length on the pads, tapped to midwicket
Zampa to Jadeja, no run nudged to midwicket
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run fuller on off, comes on the front foot to guide this between cover and point
Zampa to Saini, no run slider, on a length outside off, he tries to cut it and is beaten
Zampa to Saini, 1 run googly, goes right back and taps it to long-on
Zampa to Jadeja, no run tossed up on leg, swept, but can't time it. Short fine leg fields
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run flatter on the stumps, makes room and punches to cover. they take a single
Maxwell to Jadeja, no run
Maxwell to Jadeja, no run length ball, swept to square leg
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run drags it shorter, swatted to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Saini, no run gives himself room to launch it over cover but misses it completely. Nice flight and drift and spins away from him
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run length ball outside off, sliced through point
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run length ball on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
Zampa to Jadeja, no run tossed up outside off, patted back to the bowler
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run googly, he stays beside it and strokes it to deep point
Zampa to Saini, 2 runs tossed up wide of off, he goes down on one knee and lofts it over cover. Not timed well so doesn't carry to the fielders in the deep
Zampa to Saini, 1 run goes right back and whips this to long-on
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 leg bye tossed up on leg stump, swept fine. Short fine leg fields to his left
Zampa to Saini, no run googly, tossed up and goes through him as he tries to go over cover. Misses the stumps
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run length ball, stabbed into the legside
Maxwell to Saini, no run goes for the drive but is beaten all ends up
Maxwell to Saini, no run flatter on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
Maxwell to Saini, 2 runs quicker one outside off, he slashes at it, gets a thick outside edge that short third man can't quite get his hands to
Maxwell to Saini, SIX runs nails it over the bowler's head. Went down on one knee and slog-swept this straight back. Tossed up and in the slot, and he got hold of it nicely
Maxwell to Saini, no run has another big swing, but this time can't connect. Length ball going across him, he was clearing his leg and looking for cow corner
Zampa to Jadeja, SIX runs down the track and over the top. Tossed up and he came down and hit this very straight, over long-on
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run sliding across him on a length, cuts it to deep point
Zampa to Saini, 1 run length ball, spinning away from off, he carves it to deep point
Zampa to Shami, no run googly first up, and Shami goes deep in his crease and defends it
Zampa to Shami, 1 run tossed up outside off, nicely stroked through backward point
Maxwell to Shami, no run length on the stumps, goes back and across to cover his stumps and nudge it to midwicket
Maxwell to Shami, no run length on leg stump, tries to cart it away over fine leg but gets it on the pad
Maxwell to Shami, SIX runs boom. Shami won't be kept quiet for long. Comes down the track and has a nice clean swing of his bat to send this way over deep midwicket
Maxwell to Shami, FOUR runs down the track again and he absolutely leathers this, flatter than the last one but more powerful too, bisects long-on and deep midwicket
Maxwell to Shami, 1 run full toss, going for another heave-ho of a hit, but it squirts off the leading edge towards cover
Maxwell to Saini, FOUR runs flatter and quicker, tried to flat bat it towards midwicket but it takes the top edge and runs very fine - no fielder to stop that one
Starc to Shami, 1 run full on off from around the wicket, driven on the up to deep point

Starc to Saini, no run they've gone for a review for caught behind. I think it flicked the pad. length ball goes down leg and Carey collects and belts out an appeal. Starc follows but not as confidently. Finch has gone for the review though Starc seemed to shrug as if to say 'I'm not sure'. Nothi
Starc to Saini, no run yorker outside off, driven confidently to mid-off. Not timed that well though
Starc to Saini, no run full outside off, giving himself room to slash it on the offside but can't connect
Starc to Saini, 1 run fuller outside off, thick outside edge goes to third man
Starc to Shami, no run beaten outside off, length ball and he is feeling for it
Hazlewood to Saini, 2 runs goes for the yorker on middle stump, doesn't quite get it, the batsman clears front leg and swipes across the line to deep midwicket
Hazlewood to Saini, (no ball) yorker on middle and leg now, he can't get bat on it. Was sliding down leg
Hazlewood to Saini, 2 runs width outside off and he crashes this full ball through cover
Hazlewood to Saini, no run full on the stumps, clipped to mid-on
Hazlewood to Saini, 2 runs back of a length outside off, steps away and throws his bat at it. The sliced shot lobs up, but doesn't carry to third man
Hazlewood to Saini, no run low full toss, yorker gone wrong, he heaves it to mid-on
Hazlewood to Saini, 1 run length outside off, he's trying to thrash it through off again but gets the toe-end of the bat and it trickles to third man
Starc to Saini, no run fuller on the stumps, patted to mid-off
Starc to Saini, 1 run steps away to carve this length ball through point. There's a man in the deep to field
Starc to Bumrah, no run yorker outside off, Bumrah keeps it out, getting right behind it and patting to cover
Starc to Bumrah, no run back of a length outside off, Bumrah was probably expecting a yorker, and he's late on that, goes past his bat
Starc to Bumrah, no run yorker goes through him, misses off stump though, and it's a big win for Australia
